message.content:
{"id": "124620", 
"title": "Referenced Parameter icon should be invalid if the parameter in library is deleted", 
"description": "", 
"OB": "When a report scalar parameter is deleted from a library file and the library file is referenced in a report design, the icon of the parameter in the data explorer view of the report design remains unchanged, even though the parameter no longer exists in the library file.", 
"EB": "The icon of a report scalar parameter should be updated to indicate that it is invalid or does not exist when the parameter is deleted from the library file that is referenced in the report design.", 
"SR": "To reproduce the issue: 
1. Insert a report scalar parameter in a library file. 
2. Create a report design and use the above library file. 
3. In the library explorer, pull the parameter to the data explorer view of the report. 
4. Open the library file and delete the parameter. 
5. Reopen the report design file and observe that the icon of the parameter in the data explorer view remains unchanged."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '124620', 'title': 'Bug 124620Referenced Parameter icon should be invalid if the parameter in library is deleted', 'description': '', 'OB': '', 'EB': '', 'SR': 'Insert a report scalar parameter.2.Create a report, use the above library. In the library explorer, pull the parameter to the data explorer view of report.3.Open the library file, delete the parameter. Then reopen the report design file, the icon of parameter seems nothing happened. '}
